title: My second type design workshop
content:
I've uploaded a couple of pictures and words on my latest type design workshop over at my website. [http://www.kennmunk.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113000/http:/www.kennmunk.com/ "http://www.kennmunk.com") click "workshops"  
The pictures aren't that good, sorry about that.  
Forcing the students to make the Greek alphabet was a succes, I think. It's close to the latin one, but still had some surprising characters for them to work on.  
My only regret is that I didn't get a Greek to show up for evaluation.
author: kennmunk

comments.content:
Seems both clever and rewarding - good going forcing  
them to think instead of simply make. But a "native"  
would certainly have been useful.

hhp

Thanks, Hrant.  
Even though they could see my point, they complained a lot, saying that they'd rather make something they could actually use...
